language.welcomeTitle: Welcome to the MegaRAID Software RAID 5 Installer!
language.welcomeIntro: This wizard will walk you through updating the MegaRAID Software RAID 5 device driver.
language.installHeaderTitle: Installing the MegaRAID Software RAID 5 driver for your device...
language.finishText: You are finished installing the MegaRAID Software RAID 5 device driver.
